@correct_culture_primary_score = 100
@better_than_the_alternatives_score = 50
@always_primary_score = 1000

# EMPIRES

# special titles
k_papal_state = {
	color = { 255 249 198 }
	color2 = { 220 220 0 }
	definite_form = yes
	ruler_uses_title_name = no
	landless = yes
	
	capital = c_roma
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		add = @always_primary_score
	}

	destroy_if_invalid_heir = yes
	no_automatic_claims = yes
	always_follows_primary_heir = yes
	de_jure_drift_disabled = yes

	male_names = { Alexander Anastasius Benedictus Caelestinus Callistus Clemens Eugenius Leo Gregorius Hadrianus Honorius Innocentius Ioannes Lucius Marinus Martinus Nicolaus Sergius Silvester Stephanus Urbanus Victor }
}

k_danelaw = {
	color = { 247 93 42 }
	color2 = { 220 220 0 }

	capital = c_north_riding

	cultural_names = {

		danish = "Danelagan"
		northeod = "Danelagan"
		norse = "Danalög"
		swedish = "Danelagen"
		norwegian = "Danelagan"
		norse_gaelic = "Danelagan"

	}
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture_group = culture_group:north_germanic_group
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}
}

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				has_culture_group = culture_group:brythonic_group
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:welsh
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:cumbrian
						culture = culture:cornish
						culture = culture:breton
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:norse_gaelic
						culture = culture:scottish
						culture = culture:gaelic
						culture = culture:pictish
					}
				}

			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:irish
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

			ai_primary_priority = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						culture = culture:cumbrian
					}
					add = @correct_culture_primary_score
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						culture = culture:welsh
						culture = culture:cornish
						culture = culture:breton
					}
					add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
				}
			}

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				has_culture_group = culture_group:goidelic_group
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:irish
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:gaelic
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

	k_cornwall = {
		color = { 204 153 10 }
		color2 = { 220 220 0 }

		cultural_names = {

			cornish = "Kernow"

			anglo_saxon = "Cornweal"
			old_saxon = "Cornweal"

			roman = "Cornubia"

			norse = "Kornbretaland"
			danish = "Kornbretaland"
			northeod = "Kornbretaland"
			swedish = "Kornbretaland"
			norwegian = "Kornbretaland"
			norse_gaelic = "Kornbretaland"

			norman = "Cornouaille"
			french = "Cornouailles"
			frankish = "Cornouailles"
			outremer = "Cornouailles"
			occitan = "Cornouailles"

			breton = "Kernev-Veur"
			welsh = "Cernyw"
			gaelic = "A' Chòrn"
			irish = "Corn na Breataine"
		}
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				has_culture_group = culture_group:brythonic_group
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:cornish
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:welsh
						culture = culture:cumbrian
						culture = culture:breton
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		capital = c_cornwall
	}
}

			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				OR = {
					culture = culture:old_saxon
					culture = culture:anglo_saxon
				}
			}
		}

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				OR = {
					culture = culture:frisian
					culture = culture:dutch
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:frisian
						culture = culture:dutch
					}
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = culture_group:central_germanic_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:french
						culture = culture:norman
						culture = culture:occitan
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

				limit = { is_ai = yes }
				NOT = { exists = title:e_hre }
			}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:german
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:german }
					culture_group = culture_group:central_germanic_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:greek
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:greek }
					culture_group = culture_group:byzantine_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

	k_epirus = {
		color = { 139 68 114 }
		color2 = { 255 255 255 }
		
		capital = c_nicopolis # Arta

		cultural_names = {

			norse = "Epírus"

			french = "Épire"
			norman = "Épire"
			outremer = "Épire"
			occitan = "Epira"
			frankish = "Épire"

			hungarian = "Épeirosz"

			turkish = "Epir"

			serbian = "Epir"
			bosnian = "Epir"
			croatian = "Epir"
			bulgarian = "Epir"

			italian = "Epiro"
			sardinian = "Epiro"
			sicilian = "Epiro"
			cisalpine = "Epiro"
			lombard = "Epiro"

			greek = "Ípeiros"

			bedouin = "Iibayrus"
			levantine = "Iibayrus"
			maghrebi = "Iibayrus"
			andalusian = "Iibayrus"
			egyptian = "Iibayrus"
			yemeni = "Iibayrus"
			butr = "Iibayrus"
			baranis = "Iibayrus"
			zaghawa = "Iibayrus"

		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:greek
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:greek }
					culture_group = culture_group:byzantine_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:greek
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:greek }
					culture_group = culture_group:byzantine_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:greek
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:greek }
					culture_group = culture_group:byzantine_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}
		
		d_krete = {

			if = {
				limit = {

	k_bosnia = {
		color = { 16 125 74 }
		color2 = { 255 255 255 }
		
		capital = c_rama # Visoki

		#Titular: created by decision.
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:bosnian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:croatian
						culture = culture:serbian
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}
	}

			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				faith = { religion_tag = christianity_religion }
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:greek
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:greek }
					culture_group = culture_group:byzantine_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

	k_anatolia = {
		color = { 200 50 50 }
		color2= { 255 255 23 }
		
		capital = c_lycaonia # Ikonion

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:greek
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:greek }
					culture_group = culture_group:byzantine_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}
		
		cultural_names = {

			french = "Pont"

			italian = "Ponto"
			sicilian = "Ponto"
			sardinian = "Ponto"
			cisalpine = "Ponto"
	
			bedouin = "Bintas"
			levantine = "Bintas"
			maghrebi = "Bintas"
			egyptian = "Bintas"
			andalusian = "Bintas"
			yemeni = "Bintas"
			butr = "Bintas"
			baranis = "Bintas"
			zaghawa = "Bintas"

			franconian = "Pontos"
			swabian = "Pontos"
			bavarian = "Pontos"
			saxon = "Pontos"
		}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:greek
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:greek }
					culture_group = culture_group:byzantine_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		}

	k_armenian_principality = {
		color = { 223 96 96 }
		color2 = { 255 255 255 }
		
		capital = c_hayk # Ani
		
		de_jure_drift_disabled = yes
		always_follows_primary_heir = yes
		definite_form = yes

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:armenian
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}
	}

	k_old_armenia = {
		color = { 223 96 96 }
		color2 = { 255 255 255 }
		
		#Here to prevent Armenia's regnal numbers getting messed up, as Bagratid Armenia counted its kings starting with Ashok I, and otherwise he'd be Ashok IV.

		capital = c_hayk # Ani
		
		can_create = { always = no } #For historical purposes only.
		no_automatic_claims = yes	#Otherwise the Bagrationi end up with weird claims in 867.

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:armenian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}
	}
}

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				faith = { religion_tag = christianity_religion }
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:italian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}

	color = { 62 122 189 }
	color2 = { 255 255 0 }
	
	capital = c_skane #Lund - Archbishop seat of Scandinavia
		
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture_group = culture_group:north_germanic_group
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}

		capital = c_jahkamakke # Jåhkåmåhkke
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				has_culture_group = culture_group:balto_finnic_group
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:sami
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}

			saxon = "Finnland"
			franconian = "Finnland"
			bavarian = "Finnland"
			swabian = "Finnland"

			russian = "Finljandija"
			volhynian = "Finljándija"
			severian = "Finljándyja"
			ilmenian = "Finljandija"

			lithuanian = "Suomija"
			latgalian = "Somija"
			prussian = "Somija"

			finnish = "Suomi"
			sami = "Suopma"

			roman = "Suomica"

		}
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				has_culture_group = culture_group:balto_finnic_group
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:finnish
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}

e_wendish_empire = {
	color = { 130 20 50 }
	color2 = { 200 0 0 }
	
	capital = c_krakowska # Krakowska
	
	definite_form = yes

	cultural_names = {

		norse = "Vendlandsríki"
		swedish = "Vendlandsrike"
		norwegian = "Vendlandsrike"
		norse_gaelic = "Vendlandsrike"
		danish = "Vendlandsrige"
		northeod = "Vendlandsrige"

		franconian = "Wendisches Reich"
		saxon = "Wendisches Reich"
		swabian = "Wendisches Reich"
		bavarian = "Wendisches Reich"

		czech = "Ríše Wendová"
		polish = "Cesarstwo Wendowskie"
		pommeranian = "Czezerstwò Wendowczi"

		roman = "Magontium"

	}

		
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture_group = culture_group:west_slavic_group
			}
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}
	
	k_moravia = {
		color = { 158 102 36 }
		color2 = { 200 0 0 }

		capital = c_brno # Brno

		cultural_names = {

			norse = "Mæriríki"
			swedish = "Stormähren"
			danish = "Stormæhren"
			northeod = "Stormæhren"
			norwegian = "Stormæhren"
			norse_gaelic = "Stormæhren"

			franconian = "Großmähren"
			saxon = "Großmähren"
			swabian = "Großmähren"
			bavarian = "Großmähren"

			french = "Grande-Moravie"
			frankish = "Grande-Moravie"
			norman = "Grande-Moravie"
			outremer = "Grande-Moravie"
			occitan = "Grand-Moràvia"

			roman = "Moravia Magna"

			polish = "Wielkie Morawy"
			czech = "Velká Morava"
			slovien = "Velká Morava"
			pommeranian = "Wiôlgà Mòrawskô"

			lithuanian = "Didžioji Moravija"
			latgalian = "Lielmoravija"

			hungarian = "Nagymorávia"

			croatian = "Velikomoravska"
			serbian = "Velikomoravska"
			bosnian = "Velikomoravska"
			vlach = "Moravia Mare"
			bulgarian = "Velikomorávija"
	
			russian = "Velikaja Moravija"
			ilmenian = "Velikaja Moravija"
			volhynian = "Velikaja Morávija"
			severian = "Velikaja Marávija"

			greek = "Megáli Moravía"
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:czech
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}

			latgalian = "Pomeranija"

			volhynian = "Pomeránija"

			roman = "Bomeranorum"

		}
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				culture = culture:pommeranian
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:pommeranian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}

	k_lithuania = {
		color = { 90 10 0 }
		color2 = { 255 255 255 }
		
		capital = c_kernave # Kernave
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:lithuanian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}

		cultural_names = {

			norse = "Lithaugaland"
			swedish = "Litaven"
			norwegian = "Litauen"
			norse_gaelic = "Litauen"
			danish = "Litauen"
			northeod = "Litauen"

			swabian = "Litauen"
			saxon = "Litauen"
			bavarian = "Litauen"

			norman = "Lituanîn"

			polish = "Litwa"

			latgalian = "Lietuva"

	color = { 50 150 55 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	
	capital = c_kiev # Kiev
		
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture_group = culture_group:east_slavic_group
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}

e_mongolia = {
	color = { 90 90 240 }
	color2= {255 255 255 }
	
	capital = c_karakorum

	cultural_names = {

		uyghur = "Mongghuliye"
		yughur = "Mongghuliye"
		kirghiz = "Moñgolstan"
		bolghar = "Mongoli"
		mongol = "Mongol Uls"
		turkish = "Mogolistan"
	}
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture_group = culture_group:mongolic_group
			}
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}

			limit = {

		}
	}

e_persia = {
	color = { 133 240 7 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	
	capital = c_isfahan #	Esfahan

	cultural_names = {

		french = "Perse"
		occitan = "Perse"
		frankish = "Perse"
		outremer = "Perse"
		norman = "Perse"

		afghan = "Pârse"
		baloch = "Pârse"
		daylamite = "Pârse"
		saka = "Pârse"
		sogdian = "Pârse"
		persian = "Pârse"
		tajik = "Pârse"

		turkish = "Pers"
		uyghur = "Përsiye"

		levantine = "Fares"
		bedouin = "Fares"
		maghrebi = "Fares"
		andalusian = "Fares"
		egyptian = "Fares"
		yemeni = "Fares"

		greek = "Persís"
		roman = "Parthicum"

	}

	definite_form = yes
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = culture:persian
			}
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}

	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = culture:french
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					culture = culture:norman
					culture = culture:occitan
				}
			}
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:french
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:norman
						culture = culture:occitan
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				NOT = { has_title = title:k_france }
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:occitan
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:norman
						culture = culture:french
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				faith = { religion_tag = christianity_religion }
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:castilian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = culture_group:iberian_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				faith = { religion_tag = christianity_religion }
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = culture_group:iberian_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				faith = { religion_tag = christianity_religion }
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:basque
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = culture_group:iberian_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				faith = { religion_tag = christianity_religion }
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = culture_group:iberian_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}
	}

	k_portugal = {
		color = { 182 88 5 }
		color2 = { 255 255 255 }

		cultural_names = {

			norman = "Portugâ"

			italian = "Portogallo"
			sicilian = "Portogallo"	
			cisalpine = "Portogallo"
			lombard = "Portogallo"
			sardinian = "Portugallu"

			greek = "Portogalía"

			roman = "Hispania Lusitania"

			levantine = "Al-Burtughal"
			bedouin = "Al-Burtughal"
			maghrebi = "Aburetqiz"
			egyptian = "El-Burtughal"
			andalusian = "Al-Burtughal"
			yemeni = "Al-Burtughal"
			butr = "Al-Burtughal"
			baranis = "Al-Burtughal"
			zaghawa = "Al-Burtughal"
		}
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				faith = { religion_tag = christianity_religion }
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:portuguese
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = culture_group:iberian_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		can_create = {
			faith = { religion_tag = christianity_religion }
		}
		
		can_create_on_partition = {
			faith = { religion_tag = christianity_religion }
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					faith = faith:catholic
				}
				add = @always_primary_score
			}
		}

	color2 = { 255 255 255 }

	cultural_names = {

		french = "Abyssinie"
		occitan = "Abyssinie"
		frankish = "Abyssinie"
		outremer = "Abyssinie"
		norman = "Abyssinie"

		ethiopian = "Äbisinya"

		turkish = "Habesistan"

		greek = "Abissynía"

		levantine = "Al-Habasha"
		bedouin = "Al-Habasha"
		maghrebi = "Al-Habasha"
		egyptian = "El-Habasha"
		andalusian = "Al-Habasha"

		butr = "Al-Habasha"
		baranis = "Al-Habasha"
		zaghawa = "Al-Habasha"
	}
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture_group = culture_group:east_african_group
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}

		tamil = "Bharat"
		telugu = "Bharat"
		kannada = "Bharat"	
		bengali = "Bharôt"
		oriya = "Bharôtô"
		assamese = "Bharat"
		hindustani = "Bharat"
		gujarati = "Bharat"
		punjabi = "Bharat"
		rajput = "Bharat"
		sindhi = "Bharatu"
		marathi = "Bharat"
		kashmiri = "Bharat"
		sinhala = "Bharat"
		nepali = "Bharat"
	}
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		add = @always_primary_score
	}
}
